verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the \w second|strong="G1207"\w* \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w* after the \w first|strong="G1207"\w*, \w that|strong="G1279"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G1279"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the corn \w fields|strong="G4702"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w plucked|strong="G5089"\w* the ears of \w corn|strong="G4719"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* did \w eat|strong="G2068"\w*, \w rubbing|strong="G5597"\w* \add them\add* \w in|strong="G5495"\w* \add their\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* of the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* do \w ye|strong="G4160"\w* that \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1832"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the sabbath \w days|strong="G4521"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Have ye|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w read|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w so much as|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w*, \+w what|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w David|strong="G1138"\+w* \+w did|strong="G4160"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3698"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w was an hungred|strong="G3983"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w were|strong="G5607"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w How|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w he went|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w did take|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w eat|strong="G5315"\+w* \+w the shewbread|strong="G0740"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w gave|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to them that were|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*; \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w it is|strong="G1832"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w lawful|strong="G1832"\+w* \+w to eat|strong="G5315"\+w* \+w but|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w for the priests|strong="G2409"\+w* \+w alone|strong="G3441"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w That|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w of the sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*, that \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w whose|strong="G0846"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w withered|strong="G3584"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w watched|strong="G3906"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* he would \w heal|strong="G2323"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might \w find|strong="G2147"\w* an \w accusation|strong="G2724"\w* against \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w thoughts|strong="G1261"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* to the \w man|strong="G0444"\w* which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w withered|strong="G3584"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \wj  \+w Rise up|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w stand forth|strong="G2476"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the midst|strong="G3319"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w arose|strong="G0450"\w* and stood \w forth|strong="G2476"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I will ask|strong="G1905"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w one thing|strong="G5101"\+w*; \+w Is it lawful|strong="G1832"\+w* \+w on the sabbath days|strong="G4521"\+w* \+w to do good|strong="G0015"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w to do evil|strong="G2554"\+w*? \+w to save|strong="G4982"\+w* \+w life|strong="G5590"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w to destroy|strong="G0622"\+w* \+add it\+add*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* looking round about \w upon|strong="G4017"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto the \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \wj  \+w Stretch forth|strong="G1614"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w hand|strong="G5495"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* was \w restored|strong="G0600"\w* \w whole|strong="G5199"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w other|strong="G0243"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* with \w madness|strong="G0454"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w communed|strong="G1255"\w* one \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* they might \w do|strong="G4160"\w* to \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G3778"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, that he went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* to \w pray|strong="G4336"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* continued all \w night|strong="G1273"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* it \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, he \w called|strong="G4377"\w* \add unto him\add* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* he \w chose|strong="G1586"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* he \w named|strong="G3687"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*;

\w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, (\w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G3687"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w named|strong="G3687"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*,) \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Andrew|strong="G0406"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Bartholomew|strong="G0918"\w*,

\w Matthew|strong="G3156"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w*, \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \add son\add* of \w Alphæus|strong="G0256"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Zelotes|strong="G2207"\w*,

And \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \add the brother\add* of \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w Iscariot|strong="G2469"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* the \w traitor|strong="G4273"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he came \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w plain|strong="G3977"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w company|strong="G3793"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* of \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w out|strong="G0575"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* from the sea \w coast|strong="G3882"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="G5184"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sidon|strong="G4605"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* to \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to be \w healed|strong="G2390"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w diseases|strong="G3554"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they that were \w vexed|strong="G3791"\w* \w with|strong="G5259"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w healed|strong="G2323"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* to \w touch|strong="G0680"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* there \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w virtue|strong="G1411"\w* \w out|strong="G3844"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w healed|strong="G2390"\w* \add them\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* lifted \w up|strong="G1869"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, and \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Blessed|strong="G3107"\+w* \+add be ye\+add* \+w poor|strong="G4434"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w yours|strong="G5212"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Blessed|strong="G3107"\+w* \+add are ye\+add* \+w that hunger|strong="G3983"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye shall be filled|strong="G5526"\+w*. \+w Blessed|strong="G3107"\+w* \+add are ye\+add* \+w that weep|strong="G2799"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye shall laugh|strong="G1070"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Blessed|strong="G3107"\+w* \+w are ye|strong="G2075"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w shall hate|strong="G3404"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w they shall separate|strong="G0873"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+add from their company\+add*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall reproach|strong="G3679"\+w* \+add you\+add*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w cast out|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w name|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G4190"\+w*, \+w for|strong="G1752"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man’s|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w sake|strong="G5207"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Rejoice ye|strong="G5463"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w leap for joy|strong="G4640"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w*, \+w behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w reward|strong="G3408"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w great|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w in|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w the like manner|strong="G5024"\+w* \+w did|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w their|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w fathers|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w unto the prophets|strong="G4396"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G4133"\+w* \+w woe|strong="G3759"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w that are rich|strong="G4145"\+w*! \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye have received|strong="G0568"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w consolation|strong="G3874"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Woe|strong="G3759"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w that are full|strong="G1705"\+w*! \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye shall hunger|strong="G3983"\+w*. \+w Woe|strong="G3759"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w that laugh|strong="G1070"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w*! \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye shall mourn|strong="G3996"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w weep|strong="G2799"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Woe|strong="G3759"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w shall speak|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w well|strong="G2573"\+w* \+w of you|strong="G5209"\+w*! \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w so|strong="G5024"\+w* \+w did|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w their|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w fathers|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w to the false prophets|strong="G5578"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w But|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w which hear|strong="G0191"\+w*, \+w Love|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w enemies|strong="G2190"\+w*, \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w good|strong="G2573"\+w* \+w to them which hate|strong="G3404"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*,\wj*

\wj  \+w Bless|strong="G2127"\+w* \+w them that curse|strong="G2672"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w pray|strong="G4336"\+w* \+w for|strong="G5228"\+w* \+w them which despitefully use|strong="G1908"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And unto him that smiteth|strong="G5180"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the|strong="G4600"\+w* \+add one\+add* \+w cheek|strong="G4600"\+w* \+w offer|strong="G3930"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the other|strong="G0243"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w that taketh away|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w cloke|strong="G2440"\+w* \+w forbid|strong="G2967"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+add to take thy\+add* \+w coat|strong="G5509"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w to every man|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w that asketh|strong="G0154"\+w* \+w of thee|strong="G4571"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w him that taketh away|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w thy goods|strong="G4674"\+w* \+w ask|strong="G0523"\+w* \+add them\+add* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w again|strong="G0523"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w ye would|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w should do to|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w likewise|strong="G3668"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w ye love|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w them which love|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*, \+w what|strong="G4169"\+w* \+w thank|strong="G5485"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5213"\+w*? \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w sinners|strong="G0268"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w love|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w those that love|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye do good|strong="G0015"\+w* \+w to them which do good|strong="G0015"\+w* \+w to you|strong="G5209"\+w*, \+w what|strong="G4169"\+w* \+w thank|strong="G5485"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5213"\+w*? \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w sinners|strong="G0268"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w even the same|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye lend|strong="G1155"\+w* \+add to them\+add* \+w of|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w ye hope|strong="G1679"\+w* \+w to receive|strong="G0618"\+w*, \+w what|strong="G4169"\+w* \+w thank|strong="G5485"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5213"\+w*? \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w sinners|strong="G0268"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w lend|strong="G1155"\+w* \+w to sinners|strong="G0268"\+w*, \+w to|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w receive|strong="G0618"\+w* \+w as much again|strong="G2470"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G4133"\+w* \+w love ye|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w enemies|strong="G2190"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w do good|strong="G0015"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w lend|strong="G1155"\+w*, \+w hoping for|strong="G0560"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3367"\+w* \+w again|strong="G0560"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w reward|strong="G3408"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w great|strong="G4183"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w the children|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of the Highest|strong="G5310"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w he|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w kind|strong="G5543"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the unthankful|strong="G0884"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add to\+add* \+w the evil|strong="G4190"\+w*.\wj*
